goal.en: "The students are expected to possess fundamental knowledge on the behavior of steel structures after completion of the course. The students should be able to design structural steel members subject to tension, compression, bending, combined bending and axial load, and the beam-to-column connections."
goal.ch:
本課程介紹鋼材基本特性、鋼構件承受不同載重之設計方法與流程及相關之梁柱接合設計。
學生應學習到鋼結構設計之基本知識，瞭解接合與各種桿件之設計流程及應檢核之要項。

content.en:
1. Properties of structural steel
a. composition of structural steel
b. stress-strain relationship of steel
2. Designs of steel members
a. members subject to tension
b. members subject to compression
c. members subject to bending
d. members subject to combined axial load and bending
3. Designs of connections
a. welded connections
b. bolted connections
4. LRFD designs
5. Design project
a. design and fabrication of steel bridge
b. testing of steel bridge
content.ch:
1. 鋼材基本特性
a. 結構鋼組成介紹
b. 鋼材應力應變關係
2. 鋼構件設計
a. 拉力桿件設計
b. 壓力桿件設計
c. 梁桿件設計
d. 梁柱桿件設計
3. 接合設計
a. 焊接接合設計
b. 螺栓接合設計
4. LRFD 設計
5. 專題實作
a. 鋼橋設計與製作
b. 鋼橋載重試驗

grading.en:
Midterm Exam--35%
Final Exam --35%
Homework --15%
Design Project --15%

en.competency: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering

The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively

en.competency: The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public

紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 專題研究報告(書面)
